articles.author: Abhirup Roy
articles.title: Ratan Tata, who put India's Tata Group on the global map, dies at 86 - Reuters India
articles.description: Ratan Tata, the former Tata Group chairman who put a staid and sprawling Indian conglomerate on the global stage with a string of high-profile acquisitions, has died, the Tata Group said in a statement late on Wednesday. He was 86.
